backend/main.mo: Defines actor with types and comparators for photos, videos, events, special moments, and related upload/filter DTOs, integrating blob storage and migration mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old photo, event, and user profile structures into new versions by adding missing fields like category and default profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, associated frontend files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend files describing routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template defining metadata, SEO tags, root mount point, and script entry for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all main sections with layout, theme provider, toaster, and profile modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/EventManag: Placeholder UI for event management with disabled create button and coming-soon message.
frontend/src/components/admin/FooterEdit: Provides disabled form fields for editing footer contact and social links.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderLineI: Allows adding, editing, and removing order line items and syncs changes to parent state.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersSect: Full CRUD UI for orders including create, edit, filter by status, and manage order items.
frontend/src/components/admin/PhotoUploa: Placeholder UI for photo upload functionality with disabled upload button.
frontend/src/components/admin/Shortlists: Displays a placeholder for user shortlists with no current data.
frontend/src/components/admin/SpecialMom: UI placeholder card for managing special moments with disabled create button.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserStatis: Displays placeholder user statistics card with no data available yet.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoUploa: Placeholder interface for video upload and management with disabled upload button.
frontend/src/components/admin/VisitorsSe: Shows placeholder visitor statistics card indicating no data yet.
frontend/src/components/AdminAccessHelpe: UI helper component guiding users through gaining admin access, showing principal ID, and offering copy actions and instructions.
frontend/src/components/EventPasswordPro: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with the current year and a link to caffeine.ai including a referral identifier.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with navigation links and login/logout handling using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/PhotoActions.tsx: Displays like and download buttons for a photo with optional large layout and callbacks.
frontend/src/components/PhotosViewer.tsx: Shows a grid of photo placeholders or an empty state message when no photos are available.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation.
File is empty with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/RouterNotFoundRe: Redirects unknown routes to the home page and shows a brief redirect message.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: File is empty with no implemented component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, and placeholder order operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeNavigation.ts: Empty file reserved for swipe navigation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom color themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/blob-utils.ts: Helpers for converting ExternalBlob objects to URLs, bytes, and downloading images.
frontend/src/lib/order-utils.ts: Utility functions for parsing, validating, and calculating order-related numeric values.
frontend/src/lib/qrcode-local.ts: Empty file reserved for local QR code utilities.
frontend/src/lib/qrcode-utils.ts: Empty file reserved for QR code utility functions.
frontend/src/lib/seo.ts: Empty file intended for SEO-related helpers.
frontend/src/lib/time-utils.ts: Converts dates to backend time format and formats timestamps into readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/upload-utils.ts: Empty file reserved for upload helper functions.
frontend/src/lib/useQRCodeLibrary.ts: Empty file intended for a QR code library integration hook.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin panel page that checks authentication and admin status, showing various management tabs when authorized.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessInfoPage.tsx: Displays business contact details and social media links with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/EventDetailPage.tsx: Shows a placeholder event detail view based on the URL ID with navigation back to the events list.
frontend/src/pages/EventPage.tsx: Similar to EventDetailPage, presenting a basic event overview placeholder for a given ID.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Lists events with sorting and filtering controls, currently showing a placeholder when no events exist.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesPage.tsx: Shows favorite photos or prompts login if unauthenticated, with placeholder content for empty favorites.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to photos, videos, events, and other sections with feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/MediaGroupPage.tsx: Displays a media group detail placeholder using the route ID with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single photo detail placeholder based on the route ID with a back-to-photos button.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Renders a photo gallery page with sorting, category filters, and a placeholder collection display.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Presents a portfolio page with featured work categories and navigation buttons to photos, videos, and other sections.
frontend/src/pages/RobotsPage.tsx: Empty page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/SitemapPage.tsx: Empty page file with no content.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentPage.tsx: Shows details for a specific special moment using the route ID with a back-navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/SpecialMomentsPage.ts: Displays a special moments listing with sorting controls and a placeholder collection message.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Renders a video gallery with authentication gating and sorting controls, showing placeholders when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/types/orders.ts: Defines TypeScript types for orders, items, payments, and update requests mirroring backend structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s state, including known issues, existing features, and pending restoration requests for previously removed app sections.
